welcome_message_body: Welcome to Schenectady, a charming city known for its rich history, vibrant arts scene, and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schenectady County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Schenectady County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Albany International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is a smaller terminal at Albany International Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
